title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description:
Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding. 
Description: If the key is blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When the key is left blank in the properties file, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title, even if the key is left blank in the properties file.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Set externalized text in the chart title.
